storyInfo: Irene accompanies Secunda in the investigation of a missing data scientist. Meanwhile, Gladiia faces the tribunal at the Sophontheatrum to address the irregularities surrounding the Abyssal Hunters. In the midst of it all, Ulpianus quietly appears by the Doctor's side.

attributes.content: No one has been in here the whole time?
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Affirmative.
attributes.name: Sea Patroller

attributes.content: No signs that the Little Handy's logs have been altered, either.
attributes.name: Sea Patroller

attributes.content: Excuse me, how do I view those records?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Grant her the permissions.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Yes, ma'am.
attributes.name: Sea Patroller

attributes.content: Ah, very nice!
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Secunda takes a device from her belt and dances her pen across its surface, leaving trails like a labyrinth of seaweeds.
What's your Praefecta doing?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: She scribbles whenever she's thinking. Says it helps her organize her thoughts. It's a habit she's had ever since she was a researcher.
attributes.name: Sea Patroller

attributes.content: No one else can decipher what she's writing... or drawing? Not even that's clear. She's the only one who can parse it.
attributes.name: Sea Patroller

attributes.content: (Books are arranged by thickness, shell decorations by size, and data downloaded from the Sophontheatrum by time.)
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: (Seaweed cream to prevent dry skin. Is it because Milliarium is approaching the coast?)
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: (There's enough to last three years.)
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: (An ordinary Ægir woman. Cautious, timid even. Matches the data from the Institute of Development Planning.)
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: (Those hydroponic tanks—)
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: What are these boxes for? Why put them on the wall if they're empty?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Yes, the hydroponic boxes may provide a lead.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Scan all equipment in the room related to plant cultivation.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Yes, ma'am.
attributes.name: Sea Patroller

attributes.content: Also, pull whatever you can from Tullia's files. Education, employment, hobbies; anything that might be relevant.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: She previously worked at the Institute of Ecological Art, with a focus on the cultivation of endangered seaweed.
attributes.name: Sea Patroller

attributes.content: To quote straight from the IEA's files...
attributes.name: Sea Patroller

attributes.content: 'The artist has carefully cultivated these deep-sea seaweeds to weave a dynamic, ever-evolving portrait of life as they grow.'
attributes.name: Sea Patroller

attributes.content: These hydroponic boxes were Tullia's belongings. Images of her artwork are also available.
attributes.name: Sea Patroller

attributes.content: How beautiful.
attributes.name: Secunda & Irene

attributes.content: They look like they've been left empty for quite some time.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: According to the files, she joined the Waterway Program after a reassignment.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: She wouldn't have abandoned her old life for no reason.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: True. Her disappearance may very well be related to her career change.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: How's that scan coming?
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Nothing unusual with the cultivation equipment, but we found an operating log in the integrated terminal.
attributes.name: Sea Patroller

attributes.content: Two days before she went missing, she downloaded some data from the beacon tower control center and made a backup.
attributes.name: Sea Patroller

attributes.content: We were unable to locate the file itself, though.
attributes.name: Sea Patroller

attributes.content: Try to backtrack her steps. Contact the control center and trace the data from their download logs.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: If she was still going to work before she disappeared, couldn't her friends or colleagues know something?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Perhaps.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: What's the situation on her social relationships? What about the person who made the report?
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: We've arranged a questioning.
attributes.name: Sea Patroller

attributes.content: Anything I can help you with, Jordi?
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: Sorry. I have so many questions, I don't know where to start...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: This, er, metal tree? Do I just ask it? I've heard legends of ancient trees acting as repositories of knowledge, but I've never seen anything like this...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: This coral-shaped integrated terminal is the culmination of centuries of Ægir's knowledge and culture.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: Everything we think, know, create, appreciate, and even the questions we have yet to answer... they're all here. It's the heart of the Sophontheatrum.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: And what is the Sophontheatrum, exactly?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Conceived and established by Mártus, the great scholar of anthropology and prehistoric civilization, it is a public facility that has had a profound impact on the nation.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: Aside from the mutually-supporting atoll city clusters above sea level and the modular city networks in the trenches, most of our other cities have unique forms and designs.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: Yet even so, nearly all of them have chosen to adopt Mártus's design and establish their own Sophontheatrum.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: Look around you. This is a place for people to think, doubt, and debate, eventually coming to an understanding and making a decision. A coliseum of wits, if you will.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: The most complex equations, the most ancient drawings, the most beautiful songs, and the most well-traveled roads were all born here. I believe this is exactly what Mártus himself wanted.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: You keep mentioning this Mártus... what kind of man was he?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Simply listing all his contributions to Ægir would take an entire day, perhaps more. But I do happen to have some insight into his personality.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: Oh, you knew him?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: No, no, he lived more than two centuries ago. He'd been gone from Ægir long before I was born.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: But our professors liked to speak of his eccentricities. He was unmatched in theoretical and deductive reasoning, yet was always reluctant to draw a conclusion.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: Even on issues where the answer was plain to all, he would refuse to put the question to rest until after an extended debate with himself.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: Some would say that trapping himself in endless debate showed he cared too much about the value and meaning of things. But is that not in our human nature?
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: Which is why he built the Sophontheatrum. We needed a place where we could engage in intellectual discourse, both with ourselves and with others.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: I wouldn't say I'm up for a debate, but I do have a lot of questions. Should I ask you, myself, or this terminal?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: It seems our little discussion must give way to a greater showdown.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: They're holding a tribunal, and it concerns three of those you arrived with.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: The Abyssal Hunters?!
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Oh, hey, is that our landbound friend I spy? Aw, he looks worried about us.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: (Waves)
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: He won't see you from that far away.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Others are looking this way, though.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: This tribunal has drawn more attention than expected.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We Hunters always have, and now they even have the lovely story of our return from the dead.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Like it or not, the Abyssal Hunters are in the spotlight now.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: This tribunal will be our final 'checkup,' yes?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Frankly, they're getting tiresome.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.options: Are you okay, Specter?;Take it easy, Skadi.;Consider it our warm welcome.

attributes.content: The Hunters need to keep a low profile. We must also act with prudence, Doctor.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: We always find ourselves in delicate situations.

attributes.content: Indeed. This time, we're not merely mediating between two countries, but between land and the sea. Two vastly different civilizations.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Following the tribunal, I will formally address Ægir's consul to foster cooperation between land and sea. But for now, you'll need to assist Gladiia independently, Doctor.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The situation remains uncertain for both the city and ourselves. Certain matters become more difficult if I am placed at the center of attention.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: But no one will be watching your 'assistant'?;So I should play it by ear?

attributes.content: Yes, but be careful. I would prefer not to have to change our objective in the middle of negotiations with the Consul.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit sure uses a lot of big words, doesn't she?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Does she ever get straight to the point?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Our dear Dr. Kal'tsit thinks too much about too many things, and not nearly enough about how to convey that she cares.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Wouldn't you agree that more direct, Ægir-style communication is better, Doctor?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Don't worry, Shark and I will protect you.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Say, where's Captain Gladiia?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I imagine she'll show up with Consul Clementia. After all, she's the one who will be taking the stand today.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Excuse me! A-Are you Laurentina?
attributes.name: Excited Ægir

attributes.content: I had a hunch I'd find you here, advisor.
attributes.name: Tired Ægir

attributes.content: The environmental sample test results are out. We need you to take a look and see if we need another round of genetic testing.
attributes.name: Tired Ægir

attributes.content: Oh... Sorry, didn't see your message.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: You seem preoccupied by the Abyssal Hunter's tribunal.
attributes.name: Tired Ægir

attributes.content: You used to work at the Abyssal Hunter Lab, right?
attributes.name: Tired Ægir

attributes.content: I'd rather not talk about it.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: But yes, I was researching gene splicing methods that would provide a safer and more effective way to perform the Hunter modifications.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: But you didn't like the program?
attributes.name: Tired Ægir

attributes.content: It's not about liking or disliking it. It's that it failed to produce results, despite all the sacrifices we made.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: But what matters now is that they're alive, Gladiia and the others. I have to be here, if only for them.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: Were you two close?
attributes.name: Tired Ægir

attributes.content: Hah. If only she thought so, too.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: Magister Avitus. May I sit here?
attributes.name: Ægir Woman

attributes.content: Of course, Cassia. Be careful, though; recovery from embryo separation surgery takes time.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: This is Jordi, a guest from Iberia.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: Thank you. And hello.
attributes.name: Cassia

attributes.content: Oh, er, hello.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: There are more participants than I expected.
attributes.name: Cassia

attributes.content: Even when the Institute of Facility Management held a tribunal to discuss modifications to the city's unit framework, only two departments were involved.
attributes.name: Cassia

attributes.content: The tribunal system exists to solve problems, after all. The only reason to involve more departments is when the problem is too complex for one.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: But the Sophontheatrum is already half-full. Is the return of the Abyssal Hunters really such a big deal?
attributes.name: Cassia

attributes.content: It's a project that took two centuries of debate before implementation. Its philosophy shook the very foundations of Ægir, and its every progress tucks the string of Ægir's future.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: Besides, the Waterway Program is reaching its most critical juncture. Even the smallest thing out of the ordinary is worthy of attention.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: Simply reading a report is not nearly enough to come to an informed decision. Consul Clementia needs the counsel of experts in multiple fields.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: I'm sure that many have come of their own accord, though. The return of three Hunters is bound to cause unease at such a sensitive time.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: I'm not really here for the tribunal, but I heard you might make an appearance, so...
attributes.name: Excited Ægir

attributes.content: And who might you be?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Oh, sorry.
attributes.name: Excited Ægir

attributes.content: I'm Lucilla. I had the honor of meeting your parents once.
attributes.name: Excited Ægir

attributes.content: Rulers and ink... Are you an architect working on the dome system here?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I-I transferred out of that last year, but I'm still with the Institute of Facility Management. Now I maintain the city unit framework and measure ocean currents.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: 'Envy not the sun, for we have given ourselves the eternal stars and the infinite sea.'
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: When I was little, the foster parents at the Institute of Incubation took us to hold a performance here.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: We created a matrix of tiny optical machines, representing neural activity with changes to the brightness of the dots.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: We'd rehearsed thoroughly, but the Sophontheatrum malfunctioned on the day of the performance, and the whole place went dark. Except for those little machines.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: But a couple in the audience worked their magic, and ribbons of light fell from the dome, as if arms reaching out to invite our little machines to dance.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: It was so beautiful that the blackout almost felt intentional...
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Ha, I can picture the smug look on their faces. In fact, I wouldn't be surprised if they really had something to do with it.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: When the Institute of Development Planning did its career assessment, I applied for the dome system without a second thought. It was only then that I learned they were famous dome designers.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: ...That was the only time I saw them.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: So they were at the right time and place to inspire you.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: But you said you transferred out of dome work. Why, when you've already formed such a special bond with our big, transparent friend above?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Lucilla! The tribunal is about to start. You want to sit here?
attributes.name: Cassia

attributes.content: Sorry, my colleague is calling out to me. Anyway, welcome home, Laurentina, and I wish you the best of luck.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Pretty much everyone's here...
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Hey, where you going, Doctor?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.options: The Hunters draw too much attention.;I'll just be watching from the stands.

attributes.content: Kal'tsit's words really got to you, haven't they?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: As you're all well aware, Milliarium has successfully made contact with Iberia. As such, the Waterway Program now enters its most critical phase.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: A thread of light leaves the massive coral-shaped terminal to surround her, forming a giant ethereal ring in the air that dances to the consul's words.
More threads weave together to form cities and tides, Hunters and Seaborn, transmuting words to images and giving substance to sound.
The crowd quiets down.
And at this crucial juncture, we also welcome home our surviving Abyssal Hunters: Gladiia, Skadi, and Laurentina.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: The results of their physical examinations and Gladiia's mission report have been uploaded to the Sophontheatrum's terminal and are available for your perusal. I'm sure many of you have already done so.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Concerning the irregular circumstances therein...
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: I now call upon Consul Gladiia—leader of Ægir's Honor Exercitus, and Chief Designer of Warfare of the Abyssal Hunters—to answer your questions.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: You navigate through several rows of Ægir and sit in one of the back rows. With plenty of room around you, you have a clear view of everything happening in the Sophontheatrum.
The tribunal has already begun. The speakers do not raise their voices, yet every word is clear in the massive ring-like structure. Gladiia steps forward, drawing everyone's gaze.
Suddenly, you hear footsteps so soft they are almost inaudible, like a shadow from the somber dome touching the floor.
Not a sound.
Or I'll crush your throat.
